pageProps.title: Getting Started with Node.js and MongoDB
pageProps.metaDesc: If you are interested in developing web applications, Node.js and MongoDB are two essential technologies you should learn. Node.js is a powerful and flexible server-side platform that allows you to write server-side code using JavaScript, while MongoDB is a popular NoSQL database that provides a flexible and scalable way to store and manage your data. In this article, we will introduce you to Node.js and MongoDB, and show you how to get started with them.
